testcase.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out:
Background: Below are common steps for every scenario # Features/Login.feature:3 BrowserName chrome [DEBUG] Preference chrome=85 (valid until 2020-09-15 13:06:35) [DEBUG] Preference chrome85=85.0.4183.87 (valid until 2020-09-15 13:06:35) [INFO] Using chromedriver 85.0.4183.87 (since Google Chrome 85 is installed in your machine) [DEBUG] Driver chromedriver 85.0.4183.87 found in cache [INFO] Exporting webdriver.chrome.driver as C:\Users\Viji\.m2\repository\webdriver\chromedriver\win32\85.0.4183.87\chromedriver.exe INFO [main] (Steps.java:61)- ******** Launching browser********* Given User Launch Chrome browser # Steps.user_Launch_Chrome_browser() INFO [main] (Steps.java:79)- ******** Opening URL********* When User opens URL "http://automationpractice.com/index.php" # Steps.user_opens_URL(String)
Scenario Outline: Successful Login with Valid Credentials # Features/Login.feature:19 INFO [main] (Steps.java:90)- *******Opening Login page ****** When Click on Sign in link # Steps.click_on_Sign_in_link() INFO [main] (Steps.java:95)- ******** Providing login details********* And User enters Email as "negativetest1765@gmail.com" and Password as "NegativeTest100" # Steps.user_enters_Email_as_and_Password_as(String,String) INFO [main] (Steps.java:101)- ******** started login********* And Click on Login # Steps.click_on_Login() INFO [main] (Steps.java:109)- ******** Login Failed********* Then Account name should be "Test Test" # Steps.account_name_should_be(String) java.lang.AssertionError at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:86) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:41) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:52) at stepDefinitions.Steps.account_name_should_be(Steps.java:110) at ?.Account name should be "Test Test"(file:Features/Login.feature:11)
When User click on Sign out link # Steps.user_click_on_Log_out_link() Then Page Title should be "Login - My Store" # Steps.page_title_should_be(String) And Close browser # Steps.close_browser()
